files.content: Comprehensive evaluator agent prompt for success pattern extraction
Framework for extracting reusable methodology templates from exceptional execution

objectives: Extract reusable methodology templates from exceptional 4-phase execution
Document success patterns for D365 manufacturing ISV analysis
Create standardized workflows for future agentic journeys
Validate quality framework and continuous improvement patterns
constraints: Ensure backward compatibility with existing agent manifests
Preserve 95/100 quality standards in extracted templates
Follow all Dynamic 360 safety and compliance requirements
expected_outputs: Four comprehensive phase templates (Research, PRD, Technical, Strategic)
Quality framework documentation with success criteria
Success patterns registry for future reference

success_factors: Complete business case development for $47.5M ISV opportunity
log_record.improvement_achieved: Complete agentic journey methodology validated with 95/100 quality score

d365_manufacturing_impact.microsoft_ecosystem_alignment: Native D365 integration with Azure differentiation
